channel.title: Just wondering
channel.description: Is it possible to make an admin chat command like you do ::admin message here then it would send the message to all admins. Sorry if this is the wrong section.

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @killar6311 killar6311
item.description:
@killar6311 wrote:

Private chat is fucked up on my server and that’s not the point I want something that I can actually do that with.
